trans-unit.source: Provides support to convert an object to a lowercase string.
trans-unit.target: 提供將物件轉換成小寫的字串支援。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: The LowerCaseStringConverter class allows an object to be converted to a lowercase string.
trans-unit.target: LowerCaseStringConverter 類別，允許物件轉換成小寫的字串。

trans-unit.source: This class also provides support to verify that an object type can be converted to a lowercase string before the conversion is made.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別也提供支援，以確認該物件類型可以轉換成小寫的字串之前進行轉換。

trans-unit.source: The methods of LowerCaseStringConverter take as a parameter an object that implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext> interface.
trans-unit.target: LowerCaseStringConverter 的方法做為參數會採用該物件會實作<xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext>介面。</xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext>

trans-unit.source: This interface provides contextual information about a component.
trans-unit.target: 這個介面會提供元件的相關內容資訊。

trans-unit.source: Typically, this interface is used at design time to provide information about a design-time container.
trans-unit.target: 通常，這個介面是在設計階段用來提供設計階段容器的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext> is commonly used in type conversion.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext>常用於類型轉換。</xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext>

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.LowerCaseStringConverter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的執行個體<xref href="System.Web.Configuration.LowerCaseStringConverter"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether an object can be converted to a lowercase string based on the specified parameters.
trans-unit.target: 判斷物件是否可以轉換為小寫的字串，根據指定的參數。

trans-unit.source: This method uses an object that implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext> interface as the `ctx` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會使用該物件會實作<xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext>介面做`ctx`參數。</xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext>

trans-unit.source: This interface provides contextual information about a component.
trans-unit.target: 這個介面會提供元件的相關內容資訊。

trans-unit.source: Typically, this interface is used at design time to provide information about a design-time container.
trans-unit.target: 通常，這個介面是在設計階段用來提供設計階段容器的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext> is commonly used in type conversion.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext>常用於類型轉換。</xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext>

trans-unit.source: Override this method in a derived class if custom behavior is required.
trans-unit.target: 是否需要自訂行為，請覆寫這個方法在衍生類別中。

trans-unit.source: An object that implements the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> interface.
trans-unit.target: 物件，用於實作<xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref>介面。

trans-unit.source: The type of object to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的物件類型。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the parameters describe an object that can be converted to a lowercase string object; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果這些參數會描述可以轉換成小寫的字串物件; 物件否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether an object can be converted to a lowercase string based on the specified parameters.
trans-unit.target: 判斷物件是否可以轉換為小寫的字串，根據指定的參數。

trans-unit.source: This method uses an object that implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext> interface as the `ctx` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會使用該物件會實作<xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext>介面做`ctx`參數。</xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext>

trans-unit.source: This interface provides contextual information about a component.
trans-unit.target: 這個介面會提供元件的相關內容資訊。

trans-unit.source: Typically, this interface is used at design time to provide information about a design-time container.
trans-unit.target: 通常，這個介面是在設計階段用來提供設計階段容器的相關資訊。

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext>常用於類型轉換。</xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext>

trans-unit.source: Override this method in a derived class if custom behavior is required.
trans-unit.target: 是否需要自訂行為，請覆寫這個方法在衍生類別中。

trans-unit.source: An object that implements the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> interface.
trans-unit.target: 物件，用於實作<xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref>介面。

trans-unit.source: The type of object to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的物件類型。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the parameters describe an object that can be converted to a lowercase string object; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果這些參數會描述可以轉換成小寫的字串物件; 物件否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Converts an object from its original value to a lowercase string based on the specified parameters.
trans-unit.target: 將物件從其原始值，轉換為小寫的字串，根據指定的參數。

trans-unit.source: This method uses an object that implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext> interface as the `ctx` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會使用該物件會實作<xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext>介面做`ctx`參數。</xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext>

trans-unit.source: This interface provides contextual information about a component.
trans-unit.target: 這個介面會提供元件的相關內容資訊。

trans-unit.source: Typically, this interface is used at design time to provide information about a design-time container.
trans-unit.target: 通常，這個介面是在設計階段用來提供設計階段容器的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext> is commonly used in type conversion.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext>常用於類型轉換。</xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext>

trans-unit.source: The `ci` parameter object provides the culture-related information.
trans-unit.target: `ci`參數物件提供的文化特性的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: The `data` parameter object acts as both the object to convert and the resulting object once the method is complete.
trans-unit.target: `data`參數物件的方法完成之後做要轉換的物件和產生的物件。

trans-unit.source: Override this method in a derived class if custom behavior is required.
trans-unit.target: 是否需要自訂行為，請覆寫這個方法在衍生類別中。

trans-unit.source: An object that implements the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> interface.
trans-unit.target: 物件，用於實作<xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref>介面。

trans-unit.source: An object that implements the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> class.
trans-unit.target: 物件，用於實作<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>類別。</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: The object to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的物件。

trans-unit.source: A lowercase string object.
trans-unit.target: 小寫的字串物件。

trans-unit.source: Converts an object to a lowercase string based on the specified parameters.
trans-unit.target: 將物件轉換為小寫的字串，根據指定的參數。

trans-unit.source: This method uses an object that implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext> interface as the `ctx` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會使用該物件會實作<xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext>介面做`ctx`參數。</xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext>

trans-unit.source: The `ci` parameter object provides the culture-related information.
trans-unit.target: `ci`參數物件提供的文化特性的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: The `value` object acts as both the object to convert and the resulting object once the method is complete.
trans-unit.target: `value`方法完成之後，物件會做為要轉換的物件和產生的物件。

trans-unit.source: Override this method in a derived class if custom behavior is required.
trans-unit.target: 是否需要自訂行為，請覆寫這個方法在衍生類別中。

trans-unit.source: An object that implements the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> interface.
trans-unit.target: 物件，用於實作<xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref>介面。

trans-unit.source: An object that implements the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> class.
trans-unit.target: 物件，用於實作<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>類別。</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: The object to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的物件。
